#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define lli long long

using namespace std;

lli A[2002];
lli mn[2002];
lli mx[2002];

int main()
{
    int t,n;
    lli m;
    cin >> t;
    while ( t-- ) {
        cin >> n >> m;
        lli ans = m;
        for ( int i = 1; i <= n; i++ ) {
            cin >> A[i];
            if ( i == 1 ) mn[i] = A[i];
            else mn[i] = min(mn[i-1], A[i]);
        }
        for ( int i = n; i >= 1; i-- ) {
            if ( i == n ) mx[i] = A[i];
            else mx[i] = max(mx[i+1], A[i]);
        }
        for ( int i = 1; i <= n-1; i++ ) {
            lli buy = m/mn[i];
            lli val = m%mn[i] + buy*mx[i];
            ans = max(ans, val);
        }
        cout << ans << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
